summary: AP Workflows Page - All 9 test features verified. Page renders at /ap-workflows, summary cards display correct metrics, queue tabs with correct counts, generic queue API works, document detail panel opens with document info and history, filters work (vendor search, source system, date range), row actions menu shows for approved documents with Export action, sidebar navigation shows AP Workflows link.
critical_code_review_comments: APWorkflowsPage correctly uses generic queue API with doc_type=AP_INVOICE filter
Summary cards correctly compute metrics from getAPDashboardMetrics and getWorkflowStatusCounts APIs
Queue tabs correctly show status counts with QueueBadge component
DocumentDetailPanel properly displays vendor info, invoice details, amounts, and workflow history timeline
Row actions (Export to BC) correctly tied to document status via getRowActions function
URL search params sync with active tab for shareable queue links
context_for_next_testing_agent: AP Workflows page fully tested. Key verified behaviors: 1) Page renders at /ap-workflows with summary cards (Total AP=4, Active Queue=1, Vendor Extraction=100%, Export Rate=50%), 2) 7 queue tabs with correct counts (Vendor=0, BC Valid=0, Failed=0, Ready=0, In Progress=0, Approved=1, Exported=2), 3) Clicking Approved tab shows document table with Office Pro Ltd invoice, 4) Clicking document row opens detail panel with document info, workflow history, and Export action button, 5) Filters work (vendor search, source system dropdown, date range, amount range), 6) Row action menu shows 'Export to BC' for approved documents, 7) Export dialog opens with invoice/vendor/amount details, 8) URL params update when switching tabs (?status=vendor_pending), 9) Navigation sidebar shows 'AP Workflows' link with Receipt icon

summary_cards.evidence: 4 cards showing Total AP Invoices=4, Active Queue=1, Vendor Extraction=100%, Export Rate=50%

queue_tabs.evidence: 7 tabs with counts: Vendor=0, BC Valid=0, Failed=0, Ready=0, In Progress=0, Approved=1, Exported=2

document_detail_panel.evidence: Panel opens showing INV-2024-0002, Office Pro Ltd, $1,200.50, workflow history timeline

filters.evidence: Vendor search, source system dropdown (Square9/Zetadocs), date range, amount range all functional

row_actions.evidence: Action menu appears with 'Export to BC' option for approved documents

sidebar_navigation.evidence: [data-testid='nav-ap-workflows'] visible in sidebar with Receipt icon

url_params_sync.evidence: URL updates to ?status=vendor_pending when clicking tabs, persists on reload
